description: Variation of condition 10 (details of hard landscaping) of the planning direction for Thameslink granted by the Secretary of State for Transport on 22 November 2006 for the development provided for in the Network Rail (Thameslink 2000) Order 2006 relating to works affecting the London Borough of Islington as varied by the planning permission dated 1 June 2009 under reference P090665 and as further varied by the planning permission dated 5 May 2010 under reference P100111.
decision_conditions:
CONDITION: Network Rail enters into an agreement under section 278 of the Highways Act 1980 in the form attached with the local planning authority to secure the provision of landscaping works and security bollards.

REASON: The purpose of this application is to enable the necessary landscaping works to be rescheduled to take account of Crossrailâ€™s occupation of part of the application site and so that bollards can be provided for security and counter terrorism purposes.
